text:
Dive into the World of 3D Animation and Visual Effects with ARTFX
ARTFX has set the standard for 3D animation and VFX training for over 20 years, offering master’s programs across campuses in Montpellier, Lille, and Paris, France.
ARTFX has set the standard for 3D animation and VFX training for over 20 years, offering master’s programs across campuses in Montpellier, Lille, and Paris, France.
For over two decades,
[ARTFX](https://www.therookies.co/schools/artfx-schools?ref=discover-the-rookies) has been an international benchmark in training for 3D animation and digital visual effects (VFX). Based in France, a country renowned for its rich artistic heritage and vibrant culture, ARTFX offers a diverse range of 5-year master’s programs. With campuses in the picturesque cities of Montpellier, Lille, and Paris, ARTFX provides an exceptional environment for creative and technical excellence, blending world-class education with the unique experience of living in France.
Among the many specialisations available ARTFX, the 3D Character Animation Master’s and the 3D Animation & Digital Visual Effects Master’s stand out for their ability to train sought-after experts in the industry.
This program prepares students to excel in the complex art of 3D character animation. They develop both artistic and technical skills to create expressive and dynamic characters. The curriculum covers all production stages, from storyboarding to post-production, including modeling, rigging, and animation.
Students master cutting-edge tools such as
[Maya](https://www.autodesk.com.au/products/maya/overview?ref=discover-the-rookies), [ZBrush](https://www.maxon.net/en/zbrush?ref=discover-the-rookies), and [Houdini](https://www.sidefx.com/?ref=discover-the-rookies), and refine specific techniques like "blocking" and "refinement" to make their characters’ movements and emotions more natural. In their final year, students produce an animated short film, presented to a panel of industry professionals, marking the pinnacle of their training.
Designed for enthusiasts of spectacular visual effects, this master’s program delves into all aspects of VFX production. Students learn to design and integrate visual effects into film, television, or advertising projects.
They gain technical proficiency with software such as Houdini,
[Nuke](https://www.foundry.com/products/nuke-family/nukex?ref=discover-the-rookies), and [After Effect](https://www.adobe.com/au/products/aftereffects.html?ref=discover-the-rookies)s, and work on complex projects involving green screen filming, advanced compositing, and 3D simulations. Hands-on workshops allow them to specialise in areas such as FX, lighting, or compositing to hone their expertise.
Beyond these flagship master’s programs, ARTFX offers other prestigious courses covering a wide range of professions in animation and VFX. Each program is tailored to industry needs and emphasiSes innovation, discipline, and creativity.
With state-of-the-art equipment, instructors from leading studios, and real-world projects that prepare students for industry realities, ARTFX is a springboard to a promising career in an ever-evolving field.
To learn more about these programs and explore the full range of available courses, visit
[ARTFX SCHOOL](https://artfx.school/en/?ref=discover-the-rookies).
It’s not too late to apply for the next academic year! Find all the information
[here](https://artfx.school/en/admission-process/?ref=discover-the-rookies).
